name: valueset-severe-impetigo
title: Signs of Severe Impetigo or Folliculitis
description: Codes representing possible values for the Provide an estimated age or estimated date of birth element

designation.value: The client has Skin Lesions ≥ 4 cm
The client has red skin streaks
The client has tender nodes (nodules) under the skin that can appear on any part of the face or body
The client has skin infection that extends to muscle

concept.display: Molluscum Contagiosum - Skin coloured pearly white papules with central umbilication. Most commonly seen on face and trunk in children.

designation.value: The client has Molluscum Contagiosum - Skin coloured pearly white papules with central umbilication. Most commonly seen on face and trunk in children.

concept.display: Warts - Papules or nodules with a rough (Verrucous) surface

designation.value: The client has Warts - Papules or nodules with a rough (Verrucous) surface

concept.display: Seborrhoea - Greasy scales and redness on central face and body folds

designation.value: The client has Seborrhoea - Greasy scales and redness on central face and body folds

concept.display: Fixed Drug Reactions - Generalised red, wide spread with small bumps or blisters; or one or more dark skin areas

designation.value: The client has Fixed Drug Reactions - Generalised red, wide spread with small bumps or blisters; or one or more dark skin areas

concept.display: Eczema - Wet oozing sores or excoriated, thick patches

designation.value: The client has Eczema - Wet oozing sores or excoriated, thick patches
The client has Steven Johnson Syndrome
